28	1万			测试	通过	13,20	1	28	14	80
29	1万			测试	驳回	13,20	1	28	14	80

from rest_framework.test import APITestCase
from rest_framework import status

from client.apis.v1.tests.base import action_cache, create_user, PhoneCode
from utils.jwt_util import user_info_2_token



[文档]class CreditTransferCRUDTest(APITestCase):
    """
    转让申请相关接口测试
    """
    databases = {'default', 'credible_data'}
    fixtures = [
        'credit_manage.json'  # 这里包含了各种类型的凭证（开立，转让，融资）
    ]


[文档]    def setUp(self) -> None:
        # 提前创建好所有用户
        create_user(user_id=93, phone="18163959268")
        for i in [92, 94, 80, 46]:
            create_user(i)



[文档]    @action_cache
    def client_request_get(self, company_uid: str, url: str, uid=93, **kwargs):
        """封装请求"""
        # 添加认证
        token = user_info_2_token({"user_id": uid})
        self.client.credentials(HTTP_AUTHORIZATION=f'Bear {bytes.decode(token)}')
        # 创建请求
        return self.client.get(
            url, kwargs, format='json', HTTP_ELAB_COMPANY=company_uid
        )



[文档]    @action_cache
    def client_request_post(self, company_uid: str, url: str, data, uid=93, **kwargs):
        """封装请求"""
        # 添加认证
        token = user_info_2_token({"user_id": uid})
        self.client.credentials(HTTP_AUTHORIZATION=f'Bear {bytes.decode(token)}')
        # 创建请求
        return self.client.post(
            url, data=data, format='json', HTTP_ELAB_COMPANY=company_uid, **kwargs
        )



[文档]    @action_cache
    def client_request_put(self, company_uid: str, url: str, data, uid=93, **kwargs):
        """封装请求"""
        # 添加认证
        token = user_info_2_token({"user_id": uid})
        self.client.credentials(HTTP_AUTHORIZATION=f'Bear {bytes.decode(token)}')
        # 创建请求
        return self.client.put(
            url, data=data, format='json', HTTP_ELAB_COMPANY=company_uid, **kwargs
        )



[文档]    @action_cache
    def client_request_delete(self, company_uid: str, url: str, uid=93, **kwargs):
        """封装请求"""
        # 添加认证
        token = user_info_2_token({"user_id": uid})
        self.client.credentials(HTTP_AUTHORIZATION=f'Bear {bytes.decode(token)}')
        # 创建请求
        return self.client.delete(
            url, format='json', HTTP_ELAB_COMPANY=company_uid, **kwargs
        )



[文档]    def test_credit_transfer_get_parent(self):
        """获取待转让（父级）信用凭证信息"""
        ppk = 13
        resp_1 = self.client_request_get(
            '6666666ueiornx983209wst',
            f'/api/v1/scf/client/credit_manage/transfer/parent/{ppk}/',
        )
        resp_json = resp_1.json()
        self.assertEqual(resp_1.status_code, status.HTTP_200_OK)
        self.assertEqual(resp_json['data']['id'], ppk, "获取待转让凭证信息失败！")



[文档]    def test_credit_transfer_create(self):
        """转让申请"""
        ppk = 13
        data_basic = {
            "amount": 10000,
            "company_id": 28,
            "time_limit_id": 1
        }
        resp_1 = self.client_request_post(
            '6666666ueiornx983209wst',
            f'/api/v1/scf/client/credit_manage/transfer/parent/{ppk}/',
            data=data_basic
        )
        resp_json = resp_1.json()
        tpk = resp_json['data']['id']
        self.assertEqual(resp_1.status_code, status.HTTP_200_OK)
        self.assertEqual(tpk, 30, "提交转让基本信息失败！")

        with PhoneCode('pay', '18163959268') as phone_code:
            data_enclosure = {
                "contracts": [
                    {
                        "contract_no": "ullamco cillum sit sunt mollit",
                        "contract_amount": 95000,
                        "contract_enclosure": [
                            {
                                "file_name": "据定具信眼很",
                                "url": "http://jviprrjl.中国互联.网络/mffy"
                            }
                        ],
                        "contract_sign_at": "2022-03-07",
                        "invoice_enclosure": [
                            {
                                "file_name": "面质线广价约张",
                                "url": "http://ldhik.biz/uteciiixj"
                            }
                        ],
                        "other_enclosure": [
                        ]
                    }
                ],
                "phone_code": phone_code
            }
            resp_2 = self.client_request_post(
                '6666666ueiornx983209wst',
                f'/api/v1/scf/client/credit_manage/transfer/{tpk}/enclosure/',
                data=data_enclosure
            )
            resp_json = resp_2.json()
            self.assertEqual(resp_2.status_code, status.HTTP_200_OK)
            self.assertEqual(resp_json['data']['id'], 30, "提交转让申请失败！")



[文档]    def test_credit_transfer_update(self):
        """
        驳回后同时修改转让基本信息及要件（第一二步）
        """
        with PhoneCode('pay', '18163959268') as phone_code:
            data = {
                "amount": 10000,
                "company_id": 28,
                "time_limit_id": 1,
                "contracts": [
                    {
                        "contract_no": "ullamco cillum sit sunt mollit",
                        "contract_amount": 95000,
                        "contract_enclosure": [
                            {
                                "file_name": "据定具信眼很",
                                "url": "http://jviprrjl.中国互联.网络/mffy"
                            }
                        ],
                        "contract_sign_at": "2022-03-07",
                        "invoice_enclosure": [
                            {
                                "file_name": "面质线广价约张",
                                "url": "http://ldhik.biz/uteciiixj"
                            }
                        ],
                        "other_enclosure": [
                        ]
                    }
                ],
                "phone_code": phone_code
            }
            tpk = 16
            resp = self.client_request_put(
                '6666666ueiornx983209wst',
                f'/api/v1/scf/client/credit_manage/transfer/{tpk}/update/',
                data=data
            )
            resp_json = resp.json()
            self.assertEqual(resp.status_code, status.HTTP_200_OK)
            self.assertEqual(resp_json['data']['id'], 16, "同时修改转让一二步信息失败！")



[文档]    def test_credit_transfer_update_basic_and_enclosure(self):
        """
        修改转让基本信息及合同要件儿
        """
        tpk = 16
        data = {
            "amount": 10000,
            "company_id": 28,
            "time_limit_id": 1,
        }
        resp = self.client_request_put(
            '6666666ueiornx983209wst',
            f'/api/v1/scf/client/credit_manage/transfer/{tpk}/',
            data=data
        )
        resp_json = resp.json()
        self.assertEqual(resp.status_code, status.HTTP_200_OK)
        self.assertEqual(resp_json['data']['amount'], '10000.00', "修改开立基本信息失败！")

        with PhoneCode('pay', '18163959268') as phone_code:
            data = {
                "contracts": [
                    {
                        "contract_no": "ullamco cillum sit sunt mollit",
                        "contract_amount": 95000,
                        "contract_enclosure": [
                            {
                                "file_name": "据定具信眼很",
                                "url": "http://jviprrjl.中国互联.网络/mffy"
                            }
                        ],
                        "contract_sign_at": "2022-03-07",
                        "invoice_enclosure": [
                            {
                                "file_name": "面质线广价约张",
                                "url": "http://ldhik.biz/uteciiixj"
                            }
                        ],
                        "other_enclosure": [
                        ]
                    }
                ],
                "phone_code": phone_code
            }
            resp = self.client_request_post(
                '6666666ueiornx983209wst',
                f'/api/v1/scf/client/credit_manage/transfer/{tpk}/enclosure/',
                data=data
            )
            resp_json = resp.json()
            self.assertEqual(resp.status_code, status.HTTP_200_OK)
            self.assertEqual(resp_json['data']['id'], 16, "修改开立合同要件儿信息失败！")



[文档]    def test_credit_transfer_get_basic(self):
        """
        获取转让基本信息接口
        """
        tpk = 16
        resp = self.client_request_get(
            '6666666ueiornx983209wst',
            f'/api/v1/scf/client/credit_manage/transfer/{tpk}/',
        )
        resp_json = resp.json()
        self.assertEqual(resp.status_code, status.HTTP_200_OK)
        self.assertEqual(resp_json['data']['id'], 16, "获取转让基本信息失败！")



[文档]    def test_credit_transfer_get_enclosure(self):
        """
        获取转让合同要件儿
        """
        tpk = 16
        resp = self.client_request_get(
            '6666666ueiornx983209wst',
            f'/api/v1/scf/client/credit_manage/transfer/{tpk}/enclosure/',
        )
        resp_json = resp.json()
        self.assertEqual(resp.status_code, status.HTTP_200_OK)
        self.assertIsNotNone(resp_json['data']['list'], "获取转让合同要件儿信息失败！")



[文档]    def test_credit_transfer_get_detail(self):
        """
        获取转让凭证详情
        """
        tpk = 16
        resp = self.client_request_get(
            '6666666ueiornx983209wst',
            f'/api/v1/scf/client/credit_manage/transfer/{tpk}/detail/',
        )
        resp_json = resp.json()
        self.assertEqual(resp.status_code, status.HTTP_200_OK)
        self.assertIsNotNone(resp_json['data']['credit_certificate'], "获取开立详情信息失败！")



[文档]    def test_credit_transfer_invalid(self):
        """
        作废转让凭证
        """
        tpk = 16
        resp = self.client_request_delete(
            '6666666ueiornx983209wst',
            f'/api/v1/scf/client/credit_manage/transfer/{tpk}/',
        )
        self.assertEqual(resp.status_code, status.HTTP_200_OK, "作废转让凭证！")
